title: The Peacock Writers' Present: The Rain Cloud's Gift
description: Spring is in the air and summer is around the corner. In this series, we offer you the theme of Spring, Rainbows and Renewal in a collection of short stories and poems for children ages 0-12+. The Peacock Writers are a group of Authors from around the world who join together in the spirit of giving by offering their talents in writing, poems and artwork. The Peacock Writers and the proceeds of this book, are dedicated to children and the charities the feed, comfort and defend them. Please join them in making children's dreams come true.
author: Gwenna D'Young
